Name: Perigard Zalman
Details: Perigard Zalman has been Khan f Clan Steel Viper since Clans' loss to the Com Guards on Tukayyid. His reign has seen the Steel Vipers ejected from the Inner Sphere by Clan Jade Falcon after a failed attempt to supplant them in their Occupational Zone, and the Khan is obsessed with regaining the loss of honor suffered by the Vipers.
